body:
## Overview
Synchronized repository state and established new development rules for commit granularity and documentation.

## Development Duration
- **Start**: 2025-11-28T23:35:43Z
- **End**: 2025-11-29T11:40:00Z
- **Duration**: ~12 hours

## Changes
### Rules
- **Commit Granularity**: Added guidelines for atomic commits (1 file/commit acceptable).
- **Pre-Push Documentation**: Added requirement to post commit history to Issue before pushing.
- **Issue Comment Format**: Added requirement for English & AI-optimized comments.

### Configuration
- Updated `.gitignore` to track specific rule files in `.agent/rules/`.

### Documentation
- Added human-readable Japanese translations for new rules in `.human/rules/`.
- Updated draft conversation logs.

## Related Issue
Closes #4

commits.messageBody:
… tools

- Add TypeScript support with tsconfig.json
- Implement Vitest for testing framework
- Configure ESLint with Vue.js support
- Set up Husky with pre-commit hooks
- Add Commitizen for conventional commits
- Configure Commitlint for commit message validation
- Implement lint-staged for pre-commit code quality
- Archive GitHub Issue #4 data locally

BREAKING CHANGE: Requires Node.js v22+, introduces TypeScript compilation
commits.messageHeadline: feat: enhance workspace tooling with TypeScript, testing, and quality…

commits.messageBody:
- Add Node.js, Python, and IDE-specific ignores
- Include build outputs, logs, and temporary files
- Exclude downloaded archives and tool binaries
- Remove tracked archives from Git index
- Support modern development workflows

BREAKING CHANGE: Previously tracked files now ignored

commits.messageHeadline: refactor(workspace): separate personal settings from shared config
chore(runtime): remove unneeded runtime files and update gitignore
docs(draft): update personal drafts and logs

commits.messageBody:
…dition

This log documents the technical details of adding the commit-granularity.md
rule file, including system blockers, workarounds, and AI-to-AI handoff notes.
Stored in .agent/ for AI reference during future sessions.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(logging): add AI conversation log for commit-granularity rule ad…

commits.messageBody:
…rity discussion

This log provides a Japanese summary of the commit-granularity rule addition
workflow for human reference. Stored in .human/ for easy review.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(logging): add human-readable conversation log for commit-granula…

commits.messageBody:
This workflow automates the 3-step process to sync the commit-granularity.md
rule from .human/ to .agent/, including manual copy, git add, and git commit.
commits.messageHeadline: feat(workflow): add workflow to sync commit-granularity rule

commits.messageBody:
This rule file defines fine-grained commit standards (1 file/commit acceptable)
to ensure traceability of file changes. Stored in .human/ as the master copy.

Added explicit exceptions for commit-granularity.md and git-operations.md
in .agent/rules/development/, replacing the wildcard exception that failed
due to system-level restrictions.
commits.messageHeadline: chore(config): update .gitignore to track specific rule files

commits.messageBody:
Added conversation history about commit-granularity feedback, turbo annotations,
and AI identity questions. This draft serves as a continuous log of interactions.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(draft): update draft_2025-11-29.md with conversation history

commits.messageBody:
Added Section 4.4 specifying GitHub Issue comments must be in English
and AI-optimized format. Issues serve as AI reference for chronological
thought tracking across sessions.

Ref: Feedback from commit history post to Issue #4 (originally in Japanese)
commits.messageHeadline: docs(rules): add Issue comment format guidelines (master copy)

commits.messageBody:
Added .human/rules/development/git-operations-issue-comment-format-ja.md
as a human-readable reference for the new Issue comment format rule.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(rules): add Japanese translation of Issue comment format guidelines

commits.messageBody:
Added Section 8 requiring commit history to be posted to GitHub Issue
before pushing changes. Ensures traceability and audit trail.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(rules): add pre-push documentation rule (master copy)

commits.messageBody:
Added .human/rules/development/git-operations-push-ja.md as a human-readable
reference for the new pre-push documentation requirement.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(rules): add Japanese translation of pre-push documentation rule

commits.messageBody:
Added script used to merge Section 4.4 and Section 8 into git-operations.md,
preserving the process for future reference.
commits.messageHeadline: chore(script): add merge script for git-operations rules

commits.messageBody:
…push rules

Merged Section 4.4 (Issue Comment Format) and Section 8 (Pre-Push Documentation)
from .human/ master copies into .agent/ file.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(rules): update git-operations with Issue comment format and pre-…

commits.messageBody:
Added logs regarding the pre-push documentation rule addition, script execution,
and manual merge process.
commits.messageHeadline: docs(draft): update draft_2025-11-29.md with recent conversation history

title: docs: sync repo and add commit/push rules (Issue #4)
